description: I saved myself from making a few unintentional grammar mistakes already, you can keep it on the side & quickly check your sentences before posting them
with the server settings enabled it worked very well with Thunderbird and LibreOffice add ons
summary: Great until recently unfortunately it longer works

description: It has its flaws and the interface needs polishing, but I love it. It's good to have something that works without spying on us
This helps me alto in my spelling I'm using the app to make this review
it's useful, although it takes a minute to open.
This tool is working good.but need to upgrade as proof reading tool for creating document for corporate and non- corporate as book writing tool.
How about some instructions on how to use this thing.
I like this app. It's about functionalities not about user interface. It would be even better if it had more suggestions. Overall great job!

Hi,
 
I really appriciate your work .This app is work good ,but please bring this app on flathub also so that user can use this app.just because of snap-store is not working in some linux server/desktop distribtions.
summary: It's worth it and work it so good

description:
When I use this product with LibreOffice Writer, an odd thing happens. I'll highlight, copy, and paste a sentence into the app and it does what it's suppose to do. However, it leaves phantom squared brackets - [ ] - around the sentence I checked (in my document). I have to cut the sentence within the bracket and paste it outside the brackets before I'm able to remove the phantom brackets.

To avoid this oddity, I'll have to bypass using the copy and paste process and just type the sentence into the app. That's not a deal breaker, it just seems odd to me that it happens. I plan to use this app with a different Writer program that I like to use (AbiWord) to see if the phantom brackets show up there as well.

Thank you for providing this app. I really appreciate that I don't have to use an online grammar checker that constantly invites me to utilize more of their products than I actually need.
Lo probé una vez y funcionó, seguiré probando.
summary: Lo probé una vez y funcionó, seguiré probando
